sentences.english: To mark or mottle with spots.
You could see the sweat stain on his white shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的白衬衣上汗渍斑斑。

sentences.english: The incense container in the temple is rusty but never empty.
sentences.chinese: 庙里的香炉锈迹斑斑但是却从来不缺少香火。

sentences.english: Hit upon on nose recently spot of a lot of flyspeck, how to do?
sentences.chinese: 最近鼻子上突然有了很多小斑斑，怎么办？

sentences.english: To mark or mottle with spots.
Snow 'dappled his shoulders. His ears were red.
sentences.chinese: 他肩膀上落满斑斑点点的雪花，耳朵冻得通红。

sentences.english: There was cool, dappled sunlight under the trees.
sentences.chinese: 树丛下很凉快，阳光只剩下斑斑点点。

sentences.english: In the winter, perspiration permeated through all over his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 冬天时，他的汗从内里透出外衣，汗渍斑斑。

sentences.english: For gelatinous blobs, sea anemones have a lot of personality.
sentences.chinese: 对于凝胶状的斑斑点点的海葵来说，其颇具人性。

sentences.english: Through a long period of weathering.
sentences.chinese: 经过长年风化，斑斑点点的。

sentences.english: Flaked with patches of snow, as hedges sometimes in November.
sentences.chinese: 落上了斑斑雪霜，像十一月里的树篱矮桩。

sentences.english: We relished wearing the same grass-stained, smelly pants for as long as possible.
sentences.chinese: 就算一直穿着草迹斑斑臭不啦叽的裤子也无所谓。

sentences.english: The year 2012 is acting like a badly behaved celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 2012这个年份正像一个劣迹斑斑的名人。

sentences.english: Police data show that Germann is a notorious record of drug addicts and the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 警方数据显示，格尔曼是个无业和劣迹斑斑的瘾君子。

sentences.english: Histories are more full of examples of the fidelity of dogs than of friends.
sentences.chinese: 历史上斑斑可考的忠狗，要远多过于忠诚的朋友。

sentences.english: He also feared of washing hands and his fingernails was very long in which dirty marks could be easily seen.
sentences.chinese: 他也怕洗手，手指甲留得很长，内中黑痕斑斑。

definition: variant of 斑駁|斑驳[ban1 bo2]
mottled and peeling off in places
(literary) (of fruit, achievements etc) clusters of/piles of/heaps of/gaunt/haggard/wretched/Taiwan pr. [lei3 lei3]
muddy/covered in (mud, dust, sweat, blood etc)/daubed in
